message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand that we're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $102.
